headline: CrowdStrike 2025 APJ eCrime Landscape Report: Chinese Underground Marketplaces Drive Billions in Illicit Transactions; AI-accelerated Ransomware Surges
summary: AUSTIN, Texas & SINGAPORE, October 21, 2025--GovWare 2025 -- CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) today released the 2025 APJ eCrime Landscape Report, exposing a thriving Chinese-language underground ecosystem and the rise of AI-enhanced ransomware operations. Despite the Chinese government’s internet restrictions and eCrime crackdown, anonymized marketplaces remain central to cybercrime activity across Asia Pacific and Japan (APJ). headline: BlackLine, CrowdStrike, DocuSign, Asure Software, and Pegasystems Shares Skyrocket, What You Need To Know

headline: BofA lifts PANW, ZS targets, sees strong cybersecurity and network momentum
